nutritions.title: Steamed meatballs in milk sauce
nutritions.instruction: To prepare this dish during pregnancy, cutlet mass must be cut into balls, steamed (in a steam pan, pour them with warm water), pour milk sauce before serving.Fry wheat flour for the sauce in butter (10 g) until light yellow, mix thoroughly in a small amount of chilled boiled milk, pour into boiling milk and boil, stirring, until a thick sauce is obtained. Add the remaining butter to the hot sauce.
nutritions.ingredients: Beef Meat - 250g, wheat bread - 40 g, butter - 20 g, milk - 100 mg, wheat flour - 15 g.

nutritions.title: Sour cream fish
nutritions.instruction: To prepare a dish for pregnant women for every day according to this recipe, prepared fish should be cut into large pieces, roll in flour, lightly fry. Pour a little sour cream sauce into a deep pan, put fish there, put slices of boiled and peeled potatoes over the fish and at the edges of the pan, pour sour cream sauce, sprinkle with grated cheese, pour oil and bake in the oven. Preparation of the sauce: lightly fry the flour in oil, dilute with hot water, let it boil, add sour cream, boil for 3-5 minutes, strain through a sieve or colander.
nutritions.ingredients: Fish - 300g.,Potato - 300g, butter - 35 g, wheat flour - 20 g, cheese - 15 g, sour cream - 50 g,butter - 30 g,salt to taste.

nutritions.title: Seaweed Salad
nutritions.instruction: Seaweed removes heavy metals from the body and improves digestion. This salad is suitable for lunch or dinner: few calories, a lot of protein and no iodine deficiency! Boil the fish fillet, cool and cut into small pieces. Boil the eggs and chop finely.Onions finely chop.Combine seaweed, eggs, onions, fish and mix. Season with lemon juice.
nutritions.ingredients: 300 g fish fillet (preferably sea fish)Ð±200 g seaweed,2 eggs,onion,1 tbsp. spoon of lemon juice

nutritions.title: Fried chicken with vegetables
nutritions.instruction: Combine soy sauce, chicken stock, garlic, ginger, rice vinegar, sesame oil, corn starch, and honey in a bowl.Cut all the vegetables and chicken breast into pieces of approximately the same size.Heat a pan with 3 tablespoons of butter and put broccoli, bell pepper and mushrooms, fry the vegetables over high heat for 1 minute, stirring constantly, cover the pan and simmer for 10 minutes over low heat. Open the lid and continue to cook over high heat for 3 minutes, stirring constantly.Collect the vegetables from the pan into a bowl.Put chicken in a pan, add salt and black pepper, fry for 2-3 minutes over high heat until golden brown, then cover and simmer for 5 minutes over low heat.Pour the prepared sauce into the chicken and fry over medium heat for about 2 minutes.Once the sauce begins to thicken, add cooked vegetables and mix.Turn off the fire. Sprinkle the prepared chicken with vegetables in Chinese on top with green onions and sesame seeds.
nutritions.ingredients: Chicken breast fillet - 450 g,Vegetable oil - 3 tbsp.,Broccoli Cabbage - 300 g,Sweet pepper yellow - 200 g,Red bell pepper - 150 g,Champignons - 250 g,Soy Sauce - 80 ml,Chicken broth - 80 ml,Garlic - 20 g,Ginger - 20 g,Rice vinegar - 1 tablespoon,Sesame oil - 1 tbsp.,Corn starch - 2 tbsp.,Honey - 80 ml,Salt - ? tsp,Ground black pepper - ? tsp,Red chilli ? tsp,Chives - 10 g,Sesame seeds - 1 tsp
